response.overview: Hippo works as an airline pilot – everyone knows he’s one of the best around! – and he lives in a comfortable little house, where his refrigerator is always stocked with a blueberry pie and a jug full of juice. Pie and juice, juice and pie… that’s all Mr. Hippo ever seems to think about. And that’s just fine, until the day he rushes home from work to discover his fridge is empty. Who has made off with his precious victuals?
response.title: Hippo and Juice
